resources:
Life Checkpoint
Ok Close Oops, an Error Related to FireStore occurred, either Google was taken by Aliens or their servers just blew up, at this point who knows "something somehow isn't working"
// Para la pantalla de registro (SignIn) Sign In c: Enter New Password Enter New Username Enter New Password Again //para los errores de validacion, autenticacion y carga en firestore del SignIn please, Enter a Valid Username [6-16 char] please, Enter a Valid Email please, Enter a Valid password password does not match Please, Re-Enter the fields Correctly Log In has been successful Error creating firestore user or Signing you up,try again //para los errores del LogIn Email or Password are wrong, please re-enter them please, remove empty spaces or complete all the fields //para pantallas de cargas Loading...just wait a sec //para el Onboarding Create Checkpoints of your life! Explain your current situation in life, in aspects like love, work, etc to the Entire World every time u feel to ! 8,045,311,447 people There is many people living or that have lived a similar life as you. Find, chat and ask/give advices to them ! Start Now ! Track your Checkpoints! Update creating threads of new checkpoints related to that specific aspect of your life //bottom navigation bar Checkpoint Ranking Profile //adding New Checkpoint ! New Daily Checkpoint Update !
Create Custom

//para el Activity q muestra las categorias de checkpoint Choose a Category you can also create a custom one ! Choose a CheckPoint ! Just the last checkpoint you made of a category You haven\'t created any Checkpoints yet ! // para lo de agregar nueva categoria de checkpoint New Checkpoint Category Name Custom Checkpoint Category Just Letters and minimum length of 3 and maximum of 17 Post Write your CheckPoint ! //para el Activity de crear Post The Post Text cannot be Empty or have less than 20 characters You can only upload up to 2 images //error o se ha guardado bien los post The checkpoint has been successfully saved Has been an Error in Saving the Checkpoint The checkpoint Update has been successfully saved Has been an Error in Saving the Checkpoint Update //Select Date and Country Activity Select your birth date and Country: Please pick a date and a country Select your date of birth //Checkpoint Post showing Daily Checkpoint Updates Satisfaction Scale There is no Updates for this Checkpoint yet Can\'t rewind anymore Filter by Category //Checkpoint Update Write your CheckPoint Update! //Checkpoint profile info Follow Following CheckPoints Created Followers There is no Checkpoints for this category yet ! There is no Given likes yet ! Checkpoint Updates //Users Followers/following list You are not Following any users yet! You don\'t have any Followers yet! //Settings activity Settings Personal Profile Change Username Change Profile Picture Others Log Out Username must be at least 6 characters Username must not contain spaces Please check the username requirements Are you sure you want to log out? Username Successfully Changed! Profile Picture Successfully Changed!
